unavailable: This device hasn't reported values for a while and is marked as unavailable. Please verify its internet connection.
duplicated: This device is duplicated by another device on your Homey. It can be removed safely.
unavailable_ble: Homey has been unable to communicate with this device for a while and it has been marked as unavailable. Please check the connectivity and battery charge.
unavailable_ble_startup: Homey has not yet found this device since app start. Please check the connectivity and battery charge.
